title: (x) Idiosyncratic italic on Anne Fadiman "Rereadings" book cover - Matrix Script {Florian}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019144624im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fadiman_3488.jpg)

I've seen this typeface more and more . . . I think in new ad campaign from a bank (or maybe a phone company). Thanks for your help!
author: roquestrew

comments.content: II had a feeling it was an Emigre entry, but I couldn't for the life of me track it down on the site. Thanks so much! —R
